attributes.action: Make it illegal to own a puppy farm where beagles are tested on
attributes.additional_details: The farm is owned by Yorkshire ever green which is part of a US company called bio resources who currently breed genetically modified mice as well. Animals have feelings and in this modern world we should not be testing any products on animals this is animal cruelty. Puppy farms should be made illegal animals are not here for this purpose they are here to be on earth and be loved by us and live freely.
attributes.background: A new puppy farm has been opened in grimston and they will be testing vivisection and other drugs on beagles. This is the second farm of its kind in uk and the beagles will be cut open while alive. This was previously thrown out but Gregory Clark felt the need to approve this disgusting act
